explanation: [0-0] The screen is split in two. The upper half shows two young men sitting face to face, each at a computer desk, wearing black headphones, and looking at the computer screen on the desk. The man on the left is wearing a black top, and the man on the right is wearing a white and black striped top and a pink hat. There is a neon sign on the wall behind them. The lower half shows a game interface, a bird's-eye view of a map with many islands and mountains surrounded by the ocean. On the left side of the screen is a player holding a green gun, wearing a purple hat and purple clothes.
[0-2] Continuing in the lower half of the screen, a black figure appears in front of the player holding a pickaxe, briefly blocking the player's view. Then the black figure disappears.

[2-10] Then the black figure reappears from the left in front of the player, holding a pickaxe in both hands and walking to the right. Then the black figure disappears and the player's perspective begins to turn to the right, showing more of the island scenery.
